ai-ja368:1.1_0: “Spread out here, I go to heaven.
ai-ja368:2.2_0: doesn’t do even a little bit of good.
ai-ja368:3.1_0: * But when the Wise One does not tremble,
ai-ja368:3.2_0: as they’re able to assess what’s beneficial,
ai-ja368:3.4_0: Seeing that his former face is unchanged.
ai-ja368:4.3_0: Just as one would be able to get what I wish,
ai-ja368:5.2_0: can’t be had by me or by anyone else’,
ai-ja368:5.3_0: you should accept it without sorrowing, thinking:
ai-ja368:5.4_0: I will give whatever deed is required.”
